original_text: And I will set my face against you, and ye shall be slain before your enemies: they that hate you shall reign over you; and ye shall flee when none pursueth you.
korean_text: 내가 너희를 치리니 너희가 너희의 대적에게 패할 것이요 너희를 미워하는 자가 너희를 다스릴 것이며 너희는 쫓는 자가 없어도 도망하리라

sentences.original_text: And I will set my face against you
and ye shall be slain before your enemies
they that hate you shall reign over you
sentences.korean_translation: 너희를 미워하는 자들이 너희를 다스릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: and ye shall flee when none pursueth you
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 아무도 쫓지 아니할 때에도 도망하리라
